original_definition: 'Importer' means any natural or legal person established in the Community who places a product from a third country on the Community market in the course of his business;
generated_definition: 'Importer' means a person or company that brings goods into a country from another country.

Article 2: ‘Importer’ means any natural or legal person established in the Community who places a product from a third country on the Community market in the course of his business;
